initialize

public static ApigeeMonitoringClient initialize(AppIdentification appIdentification,
                                                ApigeeDataClient dataClient,
                                                Context appActivity)
Initialize Apigee App Monitoring functionality

Parameters:
appIdentification - object that identifies the application
dataClient - the Apigee DataClient in use
appActivity - the Android context
Returns:
an initialized MonitoringClient instance or null on error
See Also:
AppIdentification, ApigeeDataClient

initialize

public static ApigeeMonitoringClient initialize(AppIdentification appIdentification,
                                                ApigeeDataClient dataClient,
                                                Context appActivity,
                                                MonitoringOptions monitoringOptions)
Initialize Apigee App Monitoring functionality

Parameters:
appIdentification - object that identifies the application
dataClient - the Apigee DataClient in use
appActivity - the Android context
monitoringOptions - options to control App Monitoring functionality (can be null)
Returns:
an initialized MonitoringClient instance or null on error
See Also:
AppIdentification, ApigeeDataClient, MonitoringOptions

Returns:
the identifier for the current device

public static boolean refreshConfiguration(ConfigurationReloadedListener reloadListener)
Refresh configuration by pulling fresh copy from server and updating client SDK

Parameters:
reloadListener - listener to be notified when the configuration is retrieved
Returns:
boolean indicating whether server configuration was able to be retrieved

ConfigurationReloadedListener

Returns:
